name: Shardul Pandey Talks
author: Shardul Pandey

sections.description: The plugin activates a Dashboard Widgets that shows up latest interviews from Shardul Pandey Talks. Shardul Pandey Talks (http://sangkrit.net/talks) is international program for promoting those individuals, who register their domain to create virtual wealth in webspace so if you too want to get interviewed, simply email to shardulpandey@sangkrit.org considering any conversation upon this as subject to publication.
sections.installation: Simply install and activate it. Now visit Dashboard -> Home for reading recent interviews from Shardul Pandey Talks.

short_description: Dashboard widget showing all the latest interviews from Shardul Pandey Talks.
